clue: My first is in aid, and also in range...
explanation: The "first" of "my" is M, which is in AID, to give AMID. And also, AMID is a word that means "in range".
hints: This looks like a different kind of riddle, but it actually has wordplay and a definition, and can be solved the same way as other cryptics.
The wordplay is "my first is in aid".
